collectible.title: Black Gogoat with a Thousand Young
collectible.subtitle: A mere nightmare...? Or something more?
collectible.text:
To change the mask of the Mother, invoke these names:
For the Mother disturbed by imposter's insanity, invoke the Spade.
For the Mother resigned to her daughter's inanity, invoke the Club.
For the Mother who's vexed by a mischievous pet, invoke the Diamond.
For the Mother who dotes on the heir she's beget, invoke the Heart.
But to leave your fate in the hands of happenstance, invoke the Joker.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game against both Mom (Alola) and Moon.
